head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SIMMONS, PATRICIA M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SIMMONS, PATRICIA M.

block.p: SIMMONS-Patricia M. Of Brightwaters, Long Island on August 16, 2000. Beloved wife of Robert. Devoted mother of Brad Simmons. Loving daughter of Florence McNally. Dear sister of Regina Boyle and Kevin McNally. Reposing at the Frederick J. Chapey & Sons West Islip Funeral Home, 1225 Montauk Highway (1/4 mile west of the Robert Moses Causeway). Celebration of the Liturgy of Christian Burial Friday 10:00 AM St. Patrick's R.C. Church, Bay Shore, Long Island. Visiting Thursday 2-5 and 7-9 PM. In lieu of flowers the family suggests donations be made in Patricia's name to St. Patrick's R.C. Church, 9 North Clinton Avenue, Bay Shore, NY 11706.
